name: ProfiMail Settings File
summary: Learn about .PROFIMAIL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The ProfiMail Settings file can be exported from the program, then transferred to another device using Bluetooth, e-mail, or through a computer.

description: Contains user settings for ProfiMail, an e-mail program for mobile devices; includes Accounts, Rules, and Signatures settings; typically named "Settings.profimail."
